metadata.title: CVE-2022-1533 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Buffer Over-read in GitHub repository bfabiszewski/libmobi prior to 0.11. This vulnerability is capable of arbitrary code execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1533` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmobi-tools - 0.11+dfsg-1
libmobi0 - 0.11+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmobi package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.11+dfsg-1').
